description:
El 15 de Noviembre se celebra el día mundial de los CodeRetreat desde ComunidadTIC te queremos invitar a unirte a la iniciativa de desarrolladores para desarrolladores.

Evento que ya cuenta con el apoyo de la UCP,

¿Qué debo llevar?

Un portátil con los entornos de programación instalados y configurados. Preferentemente alguna librería para hacer pruebas unitarias. Y Muchas ganas de participar y compartir un momento con otros apasionados del desarrollo de software.

¡Registrate!

Es totalmente gratuito, sólo necesitas una notebook cada 2 personas y ganas de pasarlo bien.

Para saber cuanto espacio vamos a necesitar y no tener problemas con el ingreso al lugar ¡necesitamos que te inscribas! en
https://eventioz.com.ar/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-2014-argentina

description:
GDCR 2014 @ Erlangen - Hosted and sponsored by Method Park.

Der GDCR 2014 ist vorbei und es war mal wieder spitze!

Nach einigen Novemberwetter-typischen krankheitsbedingten Ausfällen waren wir eine kleine aber feine Gruppe von 9 Leuten, die an diesem Tag mehr Spaß hatten als ich mir hätte vorstellen können. Vielen Dank an alle für den Spaß, die Motivation und die vielen Dinge die wir gelernt haben - wahrlich "a day like no other"!

OPITZ CONSULTING Deutschland GmbH is hosting the Global Day of Code Retreat 2014 in Essen.

 // German //

Ein "Coderetreat" ist eine ganztägige Veranstaltung zum Üben und Verbessern der Fähigkeiten zur Software-Entwicklung und des Software-Designs. In entspannter Atmosphäre und ohne den Druck "fertig" werden zu müssen, können sich Entwickler vollständig auf das Programmieren selbst konzentrieren, Erkenntnisse gewinnen und Erfahrungen mit anderen Teilnehmern austauschen.

Am Global Day of Coderetreat finden in vielen Städten auf der ganzen Welt Coderetreats statt - so auch dieses Jahr in Essen. Der Veranstaltungsort ist der Standort der OPITZ CONSULTING Deutschland GmbH.

Voraussetzung für die Teilnahme ist ein funktionsfähiges Notebook, auf dem alle Entwicklungstools eingerichtet sind, die Sie für das Entwickeln in Ihrer Lieblingsprogrammiersprache benötigen.

description:
We will celebrate the Global day of code retreat in Lübeck!

During normal work we don´t have much time to work on our core skills as developer. Under time pressure we often use known technics or habits although we know that there are better ways.
As well as an artist we need to have a place where we can practice our skills and that´s what is a code retreat about.

In small sessions we work in pairs so solve a problem... the whole day. It´s not about being finished, it´s about learning, making errors, trying new ways and having a lot of fun.

Please bring a laptop with your favorite IDE with you so that we can start in time. Lunch and food is offered by Dräger. Afterwards we can have some beers in a pub.

description:
Sei stanco di scrivere codice sotto pressione perchè si è sempre in ritardo con le consegne? Hai la sensazione di non avere mai tempo per migliorare il modo in cui scrivi codice perchè sei sempre intento a scriverlo? Ti senti un artigiano del software incompreso che viene trattato da operaio del computer?

Immagina la quantità di spunti e riflessioni che potresti raccogliere in un giorno in cui non dovrai preoccuparti di consegnare (anzi butterai via il codice che scriverai), ti potrai concentrare sulle regole del buon design (http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?XpSimplicityRules) e confrontarti con esperienze e linguaggi di programmazione diversi.

Iscriviti subito al CodeRetreat (maggior info le trovi qui http://archive.coderetreat.org/) di Padova, e partecipa alla giornata mondiale dedicata alla passione per il software! La macchina organizzativa è già in fermento. Abbiamo appena aperto le iscrizioni e sono limitate a soli 20 posti al costo 10 euro comprensivi di colazione e pranzo.

Il tutto si svolgerà in TalentGarden a Padova!

--

Il Global Day of Coderetreat è un evento internazionale che celebra la passione per la software craftsmanship.

L'anno scorso più di 2000 developers da 150 città in tutto il mondo hanno dedicato un giorno alla pratica deliberata dello sviluppo software, e quest'anno per la prima volta ci sarà anche Padova (http://archive.coderetreat.org/events/global-day-of-coderetreat-2013-padova-italiy).

Ci troviamo puntuali alle 9:00 presso TBD per la colazione, e dopo una breve introduzione inizieremo le sessioni. Durante ogni sessione si lavorerà in pair programming per sviluppare in TDD il Game of Life di Conway con un linguaggio qualsiasi scelto indipendentemente da ciascuna coppia. Alla fine di ogni sessione il codice sarà cancellato e ci riunieremo per una breve retrospettiva. 

Se pensi che l'esercizio sia troppo semplice e/o noioso, significa che non hai mai partecipato a un coderetreat: vieni e scopri quante variazioni interessanti sono in serbo per te! :)

description:
Global Day of Code Retreat 2014, November 15 at Luminis Arnhem

November 15, 2014, is this year's Global Day of Code Retreat. This is a day for us, as developers, to hone our skills, share knowledge, and honor the craft of software engineering.

Luminis Arnhem will facilitate a coderetreat at our offices in Arnhem. We will provide you with both the facilities and the necessary guidance to get the most out of this day. While we will provide you with exercises and training forms, we remain technology agnostics: you can do your training in any language and tool chain you--and your pair--like.

What is a coderetreat?

Coderetreat is a day-­long, intensive practice event focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. The coderetreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement by providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice away from the pressures of 'getting things done.'

Program

09:30 Welcome & introduction

10:00 3 training sessions: 45m of exercise, 10m retrospective, 5m break

13:00 Lunch

14:00 3 training sessions: 45m of exercise, 10m retrospective, 5m break

16:45 Closing ceremony

17:00 End

Contact

To sign up for this coderetreat, RVSP on this page.

For anything we should know about (for instance, you're a vegan), email kim.rouwenhorst@luminis.eu .

description:
• Global Day of Coderetreat is a world-wide event celebrating passion and software craftsmanship. Last year, over 5000 passionate software developers in 170 cities around the world registered to spend the day practicing the craft of software development using the coderetreat format. 

    What is a coderetreat?

    Coderetreat is a day­long, intensive practice event focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. The coderetreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement by providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice away from the pressures of 'getting things done.' 

    What can you learn?

    • Pair programming with strangers

    • Experiment with new programming languages

    • Write code as you wish without usual real-world constraints...

    • ... and then write code with some very unusual constraints 

    • Practice 4 rules of simple design 

    • Meet other passionate programmers that you can learn from

     What do you need?

    A laptop with the programming environment of your choice (IDE, unit test library, etc.)

    How can you help?

    Agenda:

    8:30 - 9:00 Welcome coffee

    10:00-10:30 Introduction

    10:30-11:15 Session #1

description:
Another edition of CodeRetreat in Wroclaw.

Same as last year - we will gather together to improve our TDD skills, and use different platforms and lanugages. It doesn't matter what programming language is your favourite - come and enjoy!

Event will last for the whole Saturday 15th of November. Food will be provided!

 

What you need to bring with you:

- laptop (and a charger for it)

- your favourtie programming language(s) + your favourite IDE(s)/editor(s) + unit testing library(ies) installed

- venue: Infusion Office, Heritage Gates Building, Rzeźnicza 28

Organized By: Jonathan Wallace
Latest Activity: Nov 15, 2014
description:
Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event, focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. By providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice, away from the pressures of 'getting things done', the code retreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement. Practicing the basic principles of modular and object-oriented design, developers can improve their ability to write code that minimizes the cost of change over time. 

More specifically,  individuals are are grouped into teams of two and each team “solves” a common problem, ‘The Game of Life’.  There are 6 sessions throughout the day and for each session the groups are reorganized and the code deleted.  After each session there are session reflections to help with the  internalization of lessons. 

Snacks and lunches will be provided and it is guaranteed to be something other than pizza.  Sorry pizza lovers :)

For more information about CodeRetreats see http://archive.coderetreat.org/.
name: Athens, GA, USA

Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event, focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. By providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice, away from the pressures of 'getting things done', the coderetreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement. Practicing the basic principles of modular and object-oriented design, developers can improve their ability to write code that minimizes the cost of change over time. You can find out more about Coderetreat at http://archive.coderetreat.org.

 

All skill levels are welcome, and everyone will learn something new about programming. You will need a laptop (ready to use a programming language you are comfortable with) and a willingness to pair program with others and have fun. We will work together to explore a programming problem throughout the day in a series of 45 minutes sessions with discussions.


Food and drink will be provided for both breakfast and lunch. If you will attend, please register at the Eventbrite link below to help us ensure we have food (and room) for everyone.

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-tickets-14120818749
name: Austin, TX, USA

title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Denver, CO, USA
details:
Time: November 15, 2014 all day
Location: Pivotal Labs
Street: 1062 Delaware Street
City/Town: Denver, CO
Website or Map: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/…
Event Type: coderetreat, gdcr, gdcr14
Organized By: Sean Duckett
Latest Activity: Sep 26, 2014
description:
Pivotal Labs will be hosting a Denver instance of Code Retreat as others around the world do the same. We'll meet at 8am at Pivotal's office within Galvanize and spend the day practicing our craft of programming.

Pair programming, test-driven development, and conscious practice are the main themes of the day, which we will explore through the lens of a single programming problem in six 45 minute sessions. When a session is over, we'll talk about how we approached the problem: how our choices of language, paradigm, and vocabulary shaped the solution. We'll also think about how our approach to pairing affected the kind of solution that was developed. At the end of the hour, we'll delete our code, find a new pair, and explore the problem again.

Everyone is welcome - beginner, intermediate, expert - and everyone will learn something new, likely something unexpected, about the craft of programming. You'll need only a few things: a laptop with your favorite development tools, an open mind, and a sense of humor for when we delete our code.

Food and drink (coffee, tea, soda-pop, but no alcohol) will be provided for both breakfast and lunch. Once we're done, some might decide to socialize at a nearby pub.

If you will attend, please register - there's a link to Eventbrite below - to help us ensure there is enough food for everyone to be happy.

See you in November!
name: Denver, CO, USA

Latest Activity: Oct 13, 2014
description:
Raleigh/Durham, NC is participating in the Global Day of Coderetreat 2014! This event will be facilitated by Cory Foy and hosted at The Iron Yard offices at the American Underground in downtown Durham. The awesome Smashing Boxes will be sponsoring food and drinks!

Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event focused on the fundamentals of software development and design.The unique coderetreat format (which eliminates the pressure of 'getting things done' and focuses on practicing basic principles of good design) has proven to be a highly effective (and fun) means of skill improvement. We focus on a single problem, leaving you free to explore different approaches, languages and designs.

On November 15th, Coderetreats will be held at cities all over the world. To celebrate this significant event, we'll be participating in some global activities in addition to our normal Coderetreat activities.

You only need to bring a laptop with the development tools you require to write code using your chosen programming languages. We'll provide the rest!

Check out coderetreat.org for further details on what to expect. And please contact me (Cory Foy) if you have any questions at foyc at cory foy dot com. It will be an awesome time!

Registration is available at https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-code-retreat-2014-raleighdurham-tickets-13665073603
